title: Zelmite Found!
foundAt: Found at: Zelmite Mine, Zelmite Mines Depths, the blue crystals in the wall

title: A Surviving Soldier (ghost)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: A warrior who died long ago in Veniccio roams around night afternight.  What? You scared?

title: Ancient Mural
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Grab a nice shot of the mural of the imaginary world of the "Moonof Destruction".

title: Baron's Hangin' On
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Get a shot of Baron Balloon being flipped over by a Vanguardduring a Trample Attack!

title: Bomber Head Boom!
foundAt: Scoop Memo: This one might be a little tough.  You need to get a shot of thisthing when it comes after you and self-destructs.

title: Brave Little Linda (missable)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Watch for the moment Linda stomps down on you with her frontfoot.  It might be a little scary, but you can do it.Missable: Only during boss battle

title: Burning Dragon Fire
foundAt: Scoop Memo: The moment a dragon, with its piercing gaze, spits fire at you.

title: Changing Dog Statue
foundAt: Scoop Memo: The moment that cute Dog Statue changes its shape, you click thatshutter.

title: Charging Ram
foundAt: Scoop Memo: They've got big bellies, but they also got the fastest legs youever did see.  Just catch one of them on film, buddy.

title: Clown Robo's Attack (missable)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Catch that horrifying moment when the Clown Robo launches itsmissiles.  But watch out 'cause you won't have much time!Missable: Only during boss battle

title: Dangerous Pumpkin
foundAt: Scoop Memo: When it's swinging its weapon, Pumpkinhead's a dangerous one.Catch it in the act, kid.

title: Doctor Jaming (missable)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Get a shot of Jaming in action, pulling the Shiguras' strings.Missable: Only during boss battle

title: Earth Gem Altar
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Get a shot of the Earth Gem Altar in Rainbow Butterfly Wood.

title: Face Behind the Devil Mask
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Those Masked Tribesmen fall flat on their backs.  Get in thereand snap one of their silly faces behind their mask shields.

title: Faintin' Bone Lord
foundAt: Scoop Memo: When that Bone Lord goes unconscious, watch him, because his eyesgo all googley.  Take the shot then.

title: Fallen Battleship
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Get a nice shot of the site where that Death Ark crashed!

title: Find the Golden Egg!
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Go for a shot of that fantastic shiny golden egg at Jurak Mall inthe future.

title: Fire Gem Altar
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Get a shot of the Fire Gem Altar in Mount Gundor.

title: Fire Squall (missable)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: The fearsome device Fire Squall that rains fire on Heim Rada.  Goget a shot of that!Missable: Only before you blow it up :-)

title: Floatin' Earth Digger
foundAt: Scoop Memo: They're always moving around underground.  Catch one of themMolers up in the air a rare sight indeed.

title: Flotsam Revived! (missable)
foundAt: Found at: Zelmite Mines, A Suspicious Opening, "Immortal Clown Metal Flotsam"Missable: Only during boss battle

title: Flower of the Sun
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Get a picture of a Sun Flower from the Flower Garden orAlexandra's room.

title: Flying Battleship (missable)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Try pointin' your camera at Death Ark, the flying warship.Missable: Only during boss battles

title: Gigantor Paznos
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Get a shot of the rebel army's mobile base, Paznos, fromKazarov Stonehenge.

title: Griffon's Real Face (missable)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Emperor Griffon, master of darkness.  It'd certainly be a scoopto get one of him.Missable: Only during boss battle

title: Gyumo's Yell
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Right when Gyumo's screaming.  Maybe, it's trying to intimidateeveryone.  Get this moment on film.

title: Hot Springs Spirit (ghost)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: I've heard Heim Rada is a bit of a spot for ghosts.  Don't worry.You won't be cursed.

title: Hurray For Rock Man!
foundAt: Scoop Memo: An attack by a Golem.  Get it the second one raises up both arms.Temperamental buggers, aren't they?

title: Hmmmm! Jurak
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Grab a shot of Jurak, the resurrected Elder of the ForestSpirits.

title: Ixion
foundAt: Scoop Memo: The superexpress that flies through time and space!  Get apicture of Ixion!

title: Kazarov Stonehenge
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Check out the three altars in the center of Kazarov Stonehenge.

title: King Mardan (missable)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: It's the peculiar giant fish from Fish Monster Swamp.  It may bea little gross, but I know you can handle it.Missable: Only until you give him the Priscleen

title: Lafrescia Stem
foundAt: Scoop Memo: The impossibly big Lafrecia.  Catch its fully grown stem for agreat shot.

title: Lava Road
foundAt: Scoop Memo: What would happen if you blew the legendary Fire Horn?  Whoknows?  But make sure you have your camera at the ready!

title: Legend of the Moon
foundAt: Found at: Moon Flower Palace, Dream Spiral, while timer is counting down

title: Master Utan
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Aim for Master Utan when it's in pain from eating the ForbiddenFruit.

title: Moon Crystal
foundAt: Scoop Memo: You know that big crystal in the middle of Starlight Temple?  Geta shot of that.

title: Moon Flower Palace
foundAt: Scoop Memo: It's the castle where Griffon is.  Real fancy place.  Get a shotof the entrance as proof you were there.

title: Mr. Big Shot's Shadow (missable)
foundAt: Found at: Zelmite Mines, Zelmite Mines Depths, the Dark GenieMissable: Only during boss battle

title: Nice Massage
usedIn: looks like it's rubbing its back
foundAt: Scoop Memo: This one's the best.  Priest of Rama likes his massages.  Watchfor the funniest part.

title: Night Stalker
foundAt: Scoop Memo: This one thinks it's a ballerina.  Snap it the moment it does itsspinning attack.

title: Paznos
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Try for a shot of the aerial fortress, Paznos.

title: Phantom Memo Eater (missable)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Those Memo-Eaters are hard to find.  And they never traveltogether.  How's that for a scoop?Missable: Only during boss battle

title: Puppet Shingala (missable)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Catch Shingala being controlled in the heat of battle.  It'squite the sight...Missable: Only during boss battle

title: R. Butterfly United (missable)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: You probably want to get a shot of the butterfly fused backtogether.  That'd make a much better picture.Missable: Only during boss battle

title: Ruler of the Pond (ghost)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: It's kind of like a haunted picture, that haze around Palm BrinksPark...

title: Spinning Ivanoff
foundAt: Scoop Memo: This guy comes spinning at you at top speed, trying to knock youdown!  So be quick with that shutter finger of yours!

title: Spooky Grass Smile
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Man-Eating Grass has a creepy smile.  Looks like it's eatingsomething.  That's when you get the shot.

title: Sun Chamber Gate Keeper
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Get a shot of the bronze statue in front of the Sun Gate.

title: Symbol of Luna Lab
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Look for the Luna Lab emblem up above the Central Lab.

title: The Ultimate Gaspard (missable)
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Gaspard can change his appearance using Griffon's magic.  Get ashot of that!Missable: Only during boss battle

title: Tore's Nap
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Tore may be a big bulky beast, but it sure does like its naps.Sneak in and snap it then!

title: Veniccio's Evening Sun
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Try and get a shot of the sun sinking behind the horizon off theVeniccio coast.

title: Water Gem Altar
foundAt: Scoop Memo: Get a shot of the Water Gem Altar in Ocean's Roar Cave.
